name: Coin Clicker(In Development)
description:
This is extremely basic, if you have any suggestions of what to add I would absolutely love to try and add it. There will be quite a few updates that I will be making to this, so any suggestions would be much appreciated and more than likely added.

WebGL version is more up to date with my project, but Save and Load buttons don't work as of yet, if you'd like that capability feel free to install the current version and more updates will be out soon.
